source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_00<tab>Houu is much troubled by the state of the spawning grounds, and seeks a handy shorewalker for some light poison control.
target: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のホォウは、困っていることがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_01<tab>Any egg laid at the Sapsa Spawning Grounds faces the prospect of noxious neighbors, and that is something that Houu would rather avoid. Moon jellyfish are pliant and uncomplaining, and would surely not mind being used to stuff the gas-spraying orifices of noxious barnacles. Stopper five barnacles, and should the territorial Sapsa pugil appear, stop it with something a mite harder.
target: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_01<tab>ホォウから、産卵地の整備を手伝うよう頼まれた。サプサ産卵地の5個の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E936D01 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897001 /var>」を使って栓をしよう。その際、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20AAA01 /var>」が襲ってきた場合は討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_02<tab>You have crammed the jellyfish into the barnacles and taken out the pugil who was ill pleased at your molestations. You have done fine work this day. Before you get too wrapped up in your own self-satisfaction, however, it might be best to head back to Novv's Nursery to tell Houu what has transpired.
target: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E936D01 /var>に栓をした。ノォヴの育成地の「ホォウ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_03<tab>Your barnacle-stuffing having been reported, the talk turns to the future of the Sahagin. Houu has real fear that neglect of the spawning grounds due to war will spell the end of his kind. Should the Sahagin live only for the spawning, as Houu says? Should you? One thing you both can agree on is that war is not the way.
target: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_SEQ_03<tab>ホォウに、産卵地の整備が進んだことを報告した。戦いに明け暮れる同族に対し、産卵地の確保という本分を思い出してほしいと呟いたホォウ。サハギン族との共生共栄を目指す身として、産卵地の整備を手伝っていこう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_TODO_00<tab>Use moon jellyfish on noxious barnacles in the Sapsa Spawning Grounds, and slay any pugils that appear.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_TODO_00サプサ産卵地のにを使い
が現れたら討伐

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_000<tab>Pshhh... We ventured onto land shhholely to shhhecure a place for the Indigo Matriarch to shhhpawn.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_000フスィーッ……俺たちが陸に上がってきたのは、
女王様……「蒼茫の母」の、産卵地を確保するため……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_001<tab>But the shhhpawning grounds remain untamed, for too many of our people see more honor in a shhhpear than a mattock. Shhhuch is our need that we must turn to a shhhorewalker for aid...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_001しかし……フスィーッ……戦いに明け暮れる者ばかりで、
産卵地の整備は進んでおらん……。
少しでも手を貸してもらえると……助かる……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_002<tab>Chief among our concerns is the gas shhhprayed from the local barnacles. Their noxious fumes would harm our eggs. The moshhht effective way of dealing with thishhh is to stuff their shhhpraying orifices with moon jellyfish.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_002フスィーッ……サプサ産卵地にはびこる「」に
この「」を詰めて、栓をしてくれ……。
奴らの吹く毒の潮は……卵に有害だ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_003<tab>But beware the Shhhapsa pugils while you shhhtopper the barnacles. They do not take kindly to shhhtrangers manhandling their favored shhhnacks. Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_003栓をするときは、「」に気をつけろ……。
バラヌスを好んで喰うヤツらに、襲われるかもしれない……。
フスィーッ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_005<tab>Pshhh... The gas shhhprayed by noxious barnacles harms our eggs. You must shhhtuff their orifices with jellyfish, and make the Shhhapsa Shhhpawning Grounds safe...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_005フスィーッ……サプサ産卵地にはびこる「」に
この「」を詰めて、栓をしてくれ……。
奴らの吹く毒の潮は……卵に有害だ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_006<tab>But beware the Shhhapsa pugil. They regard the barnacles as you shhhorewalkers would shhheep, and do not like them to be molested. Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_006駆除するときは、「」に気をつけろ……。
バラヌスを好んで喰うヤツらに、襲われるかもしれない……。
フスィーッ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_020<tab>The barnacles are shhhtoppered? Good... I was beginning to fear that the shhhpawning itself may be in peril. I am grateful. Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_020フスィーッ……「」を駆除したか……。
おかげで、産卵地の確保に……ひと掻き近づいた……。
感謝するぞ……フスィーッ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_021<tab>If we do not shhhpawn, it is the end for our people. What use to shhhtride off to war if there are no shhhpawnlings to return to, no matriarch to continue the line? But young males never listen. Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH206_01395_HOUU_000_021フスィーッ……今、俺たちの繁栄に必要なのは……
戦争ではなく、平穏によって迎えられる新たな家族だ……。
一族が死に絶える前に、それを思い出してほしいものだ……。
